thread.section_title: WebsiteBox.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WebsiteBox.com | websitebox.com
thread.title: Richard Goates

author: Richard Goates
title: Richard Goates
text:
I was a little leery going with a company that was unknown and the price seemed too good to be true....but the customer service and support have been excellent and the value they have for the price is exceptional!
I had a fancy custom site that cost 10x in the past but couldn't attribute even a single sale to it....so this is the perfect solution to go with!
Hats off to Mark and the Support People! You guys are doing an amazing job!
